chat.title: Legal Assistant Chat
chat.subtitle: Ask anything about Indian law
chat.welcomeMessage: Hello! I'm your ENACT legal assistant. I'm here to help you understand your legal rights and guide you through the justice system. What legal issue can I help you with today?
chat.poweredBy: Powered by AI. Legal guidance based on BNS, BSA, and BNSS 2023.
chat.quickQuestion1: How do I file an FIR?
chat.quickQuestion2: What documents do I need for court?
chat.quickQuestion3: Can I get free legal aid?
chat.quickQuestion4: How long does a case take?
chat.rateLimitDesc: Please wait before sending more messages. {{remaining}} requests remaining.
chat.emergencyDesc: Please call emergency services immediately: Police 112, Women 181, Child 1098
chat.responseQualityDesc: The AI response may need improvement. Please verify the information.
chat.conversationErrorDesc: Failed to start conversation. Please refresh and try again.
chat.conversationErrorDB: Database tables not found. Please run migrations.
chat.conversationErrorPermission: Permission denied. Please check RLS policies.
chat.conversationErrorAuth: Authentication error. Please sign in again.
chat.conversationErrorUnexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please refresh.
chat.chatErrorNetwork: Network error. Check your internet connection.
chat.chatErrorConfig: AI service not configured. Please contact support.
chat.serviceUnavailableDesc: AI service requires additional credits. Please contact support.
